page.title: 03ASHDON,SERVICES,FACILITIES.
page.content: Baptist Chapel.We have no doctor's surgery in Ashdon but a doctor comes twice a week,on Tuesdays and Thursdays to hold a surgery at the rear of the Baptist Chapel.The nearest dentists are in Linton and Saffron Walden.Our nearest large hospital is the famous New Addenbrookes Hospital in Cambridge.We have two smaller hospitals in Saffron Walden.For entertainment it is necessary to travel to Cambridge for cinemas or theatres.We have a small museum in Saffron Walden but again we have to travel to Cambridge for bigger museums. In 1984 a new leisure centre was opened in Saffron Walden,this caters for most sporting activities including swimming.There are other leisure centres in Haverhill and Cambridge.
